alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 10:51AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow is possible through early afternoon, reducing visibilities in some areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
